title: Inquiry Community-Based Teaching Competency Development Workshop for Transitioning to Online Classrooms

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic mathematics instruction and proficiency in online platform fundamentals
context.additional_context: Workshop design for practicing math instructors applying Community of Inquiry (CoI) principles.

learning_goals: Participants can explain methods to apply the three core elements of Community of Inquiry (CoI)—social, teaching, and cognitive presence—in online classes with over 90% accuracy
Participants can submit redesigned instructional plans for mathematics lectures adapted to online environments within one week
Participants can develop online lesson activity plans incorporating five or more interaction strategies based on peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
